reviews.text: I am staying in Millennium Hotel Abu Dhabi UAE since March 23, 2013 and i never felt that i am away from my home, I have found All the environment in Millennium Hotel is very great and co operative from the opening the door, taking care of all inquiries, Its staff behavior is very polite and its room services and housekeeping is at the good standard rate, especially MOHD DASHEER is working hard, It’s laundry service also very good.
reviews.title: Excellent city location and first class service

reviews.text: I mostly have done my breakfast, Lunch and Dinner at Citrus restaurant in Millennium Hotel. Its Environment, food stuff and cooking quality is best in all manners, specially its staff is very caring, smiley for their guests specially KRISHNA and complete staff. Its Indian vegetable dishes and sweets are delicious which I never forget. Lunch on Fridays at Sevilo's Restaurant in Level-2 is so relaxing with a live Music, Arrangement of the swimming pool, gym, and Spa in the Level-2 is a very good. The hospitality and personal attention rendered by the staff is really excellent.
reviews.title: Great hotel great food and great service

reviews.text: After lengthy stays at 4 and 5 star hotels in the USA, Europe and other Middle East countries since my last visit to Abu Dhabi, I have just been reminded of what makes a hotel feel really special, and it is the staff! Whilst in Abu Dhabi for these past two months or so, I've toured round some of the spectacular newer hotels which have started operating since my last visit.
reviews.title: Great to be back!

reviews.text: However, it is only on returning to the Millennium that I really FEEL I am in a place where I really want to be.
reviews.title: Excellent location, value for money
Nice.....very nice
reviews.text: To focus on an area I have not previously commented on: last week I visited Sevilo's restaurant on the L2 floor for Friday brunch. Right from a warm welcome from the friendly manager, Omar, to excellent service from all the chefs and staff, to the relaxing yet unobtrusive live music provided by the ever-charming Rosario, to first class food served in lovely surroundings, I was made to feel like I was back home. Yet again, the Millennium proves to be a great choice!

It seems unfair to single out individual staff because all give superb service, but staff such as driver Hussein, Sajan in reception, manager Krishna and staff Su and Binu in the Citrus restaurant, Linda, Kumar, Ram and Luis in the spa, and room attendant Maria, are shining examples of what gives this hotel the edge over most others.
reviews.title: Best Hospitality in Abu Dhabi

reviews.text: My family of 5 stayed here for 2 nights in May 2013 during our tour of Dubai and Abu Dhabi. I selected this hotel due to its location - not far from anything.
reviews.title: Perfect stay!

reviews.text: My experience was pleasant all through, starting with reservations manager Mr. Dawn Ghouse when I booked online. I needed to check on accessibility in rooms for my partially abled mother and his suggestions were immensely helpful.
reviews.title: good and friendly place

reviews.text: We booked 2 rooms - 1 Junior Suite for my parents and a Deluxe room for ourselves. Rooms were very spacious and all amenities including wifi provided. Bathrooms too were spacious, with bidets and bathtubs. As for bathtubs, I am surprised as to a why a culture exists to provide bathtubs across all room categories! It is a sheer waste of space and more importantly, waste of water. I am sure people living most luxurious lives may not be using bathtubs.
reviews.title: Service Second To None

reviews.text: Beds were comfortable, though pillows were a bit too soft than what we are used to but I guess for 2 days, it was ok. Breakfast spread was outstanding. For us vegetarian Indians, it is always a pleasure to see vegetarian Indian food on global buffet spreads and last but not the least, orange juice machine was a nice touch. Just pop in the whole orange and you see it being squeezed and pure juice pouring not your glass. Cannot get better than this.
